name: Pico Night Punkin'
description:
This is a low-res demake of Friday Night Funkin made in PICO-8 for Pico Day 2021.

We tried to stay as faithful as possible to the original game while working within PICO-8's limitations, so we hope you enjoy :)

EDIT: If the arrows are desynced from the music when playing in browser, try playing in a different browser. I've found that Microsoft Edge works surprisingly well compared to Chrome or Firefox

SONGS

  • Tutorial
  • Dad Battle
  • Pico
  • M.I.L.F.
  • Roses
  • Ugh

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys, ESDF or SDNM

CREDITS

Programming/Music - Carson Kompon

Art - Chris West
